name: Jane Doe
bio: 3D printing enthusiast and designer, loves creating functional prints for everyday use.

name: John Smith
bio: Mechanical engineer by day, 3D printing hobbyist by night. Focuses on mechanical parts and gadgets.

name: Alice Johnson
bio: Artist and sculptor exploring the intersection of art and technology through 3D printing.

name: Robert Brown
bio: Loves to tinker and create miniatures for tabletop gaming. Always looking for the next cool model to print.
